definition: Taihang Mountains on the border between Hebei and Shanxi

sentences.english: The role of tibia variables of Macaca mulatta in the Taihang Mountains in the sex determination was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究成年太行山猕猴胫骨变量在性别判别中的作用。

sentences.english: The canal was built right in the Taihang Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 红旗渠就修建在这太行山上。

sentences.english: Most dominant soil type in Taihang Mountainous Region is argillaceous soil, which consists of cinnamon soil in major soild group.
sentences.chinese: 太行山区多是以褐土性土为主要土类的黏质土壤。

sentences.english: Linzhou City of Anyang lies right at the foot of the Taihang Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 安阳的林州市就坐落太行山脚下。

sentences.english: In the warm and wet climate areas, such as the south end of the Taihang Mountains, the precipitation affected vegetation growth when it increased.
sentences.chinese: 太行山南端暖湿气候环境中，降水增多影响植被生长。

sentences.english: The foehn effect in the east foot of the Taihang Moutain strengthened the high temperature as well.
sentences.chinese: 太行山东麓的焚风效应也加大了持续高温强度。

sentences.english: The Qijia ridge, which is famous for its red leaves, has been a rare long green corridor in North Taihang area.
sentences.chinese: 而红叶圣地靳家岭，是南太行山罕见的绿色长廊。

sentences.english: Because is situated at the Mountain in Shansi sierra the remote mountain canyon, the sight climate is very unique.
sentences.chinese: 由于地处太行山脉的深山峡谷，风光气候均很独特。
在这雄伟粗犷的太行山中。

sentences.english: Virescence Project of Taihang Mountain is one of main Forestry-Construction Projets in the whole country.
sentences.chinese: 太行山绿化工程是全国重点林业建设工程之一。

sentences.english: The study aimed to confirm the optimum planting density of Yingge mungbean in Taihang mountain area.
sentences.chinese: 确定太行山区鹦哥绿豆的最佳种植密度。
